body:
Just found the english version, sadly its uncolored

https://comics.8muses.com/comics/picture/Fakku-Comics/MEME50/Uncontainable-Adultery-Vacation/1

damn why does nhentai delete great art? If not for the fact that I was stupid to just save the doujin on my favorites in the past then probably i would have forgotten that doujin where I fapped to it the entire week
For those that speak Spanish as well, there's still hope. Most I could find to be able to read this is a single website that has it in Spanish, but only the black and white version
some great doujins by this artist have been deleted from the site unfortunately
Finally some ugly bastard that looks like me
This is on FAKKU, so don't expect an English version on here.
Does anyone know where i could find english ver...?
